title: [GAMEPLAY] Azir -Sand soldier unable to attack after long range Q
body: When using Q over a long distance, i.e. the sand solidier is outside the visual ring or range of Q. the sand soldier is unable to preform attacks when Q finishes. is this a bug or is i meant this way because the sand soldier should have despawned?

replies.body:
Thank you for the report! 

This is one of the Azir bugs that will be fixed by patch 4.18.
sorry for necroing... the forum bugged, hilariously enough considering which subforum this is, and had this listed as a recent post on my display for some reason.

It's meant for that to happen, so that Azir must put himself at risk to continue doing damage. Other wise he could just use Q to go at a back line and have his soldiers do damage as parades merrily at a safe distance. They don't immediately despawn so that way of he moves a bit forward he can use them again for autos.
